org.openhab.binding.lcn.logic.data

Class LCNItemBinding

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.binding.lcn.logic.data.LCNItemBinding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.openhab.core.binding.BindingConfig

    public class LCNItemBinding
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.openhab.core.binding.BindingConfig
    This class represents a single Item, Connection tuple with additional information about the underlying LCNCommand. Also contains information whether this item has been initialized yet (i.e. a request to the module has been sent).
    Since:
    1.7.0
    Author:
    Patrik Pastuschek

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor for an ItemBinding.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LCNItemBinding

        public LCNItemBinding(java.lang.String id,
              java.lang.String cmd,
              java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends org.openhab.core.types.State>> states,
              org.openhab.core.items.Item item,
              java.lang.String lcnShort,
              boolean isInitialized)
        Constructor for an ItemBinding.
        Parameters:
        id - The general ID of the target.
        cmd - The openHAB command that is associated with the item.
        item - The actual openHAB item.
        lcnShort - A String with the LCNShortForm.
        isInitialized - True if the item has been initialized, false otherwise (Initialized means, that at least one request has been sent to the underlying module).
